name: @twick/cloud-transcript
description: Twick cloud function for generating JSON captions from audio using Google Cloud Speech-to-Text

scripts.verify:aws: node -e "require('fs').accessSync('platform/aws/Dockerfile'); require('fs').accessSync('platform/aws/handler.js'); console.log('AWS transcript function assets present')"
scripts.release:aws: npm run verify:aws && npm publish --access public --tag aws
